sentences.en: Aussie really love enjoying the sunshine. People do sunbath no matter it's on beach or grass.
sentences.cn: 澳洲人真的超爱享受阳光，不论是在草地或是沙滩，都会有人悠閒的日光浴。

sentences.en: By the way , we also took a sunbath on the sand.
sentences.cn: 后来还有在沙滩享受日光浴,整个就是悠闲阿.

sentences.en: I'll treat myself to a sunbath.
sentences.cn: 我要好好地享受一次日光浴.

sentences.en: The beach there is a resort for sunbath.
sentences.cn: 那里的海滩是日光浴胜地.

sentences.en: The little boy was having the sunbath on the beach birthday suit.
sentences.cn: 这个小男孩赤条条地躺在沙滩上晒大阳.
